root.title: iraq say iran attack repuls ON southern front
root.body: iraq say repel iranian attack posit held fourth armi corp east southern iraqi town amarah baghdad-basra highway A baghdad war communiqu say iranian infantri brigad back tank launch overnight attack fierc fight rage six hour iranian troop flee battlefield leav 220 men kill mani wound No major battl report fought fourth armi corp year area mainli swampland hawizah marsh run eastward southern port citi basra
